Hi, I am Mirna Majstorović Full-Stack Product Designer from Zagreb, Croatia

I am a Digital Product Designer with a strong HTML/CSS coding background and experience in designing and developing responsive web applications, both consumer and enterprise.

I enjoy turning complex workflows into simple, seamless, and pleasant experiences.
I deliver well-thought-out designs, accompanied by a clean, valid and reusable code.
